name: Futureshift
tag_list: digital-communities, strategic-planning, research, market-intelligence, market-segmentations, textual-analysis
overview:
Futureshift uses proprietary technology to develop B2B and B2C communities, conduct research among community members, develop relationships and tailor messaging back to the communities to create engagement and brand loyalty.

Some of the features of DirectLink™ software are real-time reporting of community responses, instantaneous segmentation, real-time verbatims from responses, real-time word clouds, multi-variate segment email downloads for marketing purposes. Software matches customer needs with client capabilities.
